Name: A Day Without Me
About the game: A Day Without Me is a puzzle adventure game, where you have to find out where everyone is going, why is there only you in the city, why are there so many oddities in the city You just woke up and without knowing it, you were the only person left in the city Featuring: -Plot mysterious story -Semi open world -Lots of challenges and mysteries to solve
